title: New Power Rising (4R162)
text:
Set:	The Two Towers
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Isengard
Twilight:	2
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Regroup: Spot Saruman or an [Isengard] Man, reveal your hand, and discard all Free Peoples cards revealed to take an [Isengard] card into hand from your discard pile.
Lore:	”'For those who aid the Great Eye there will be rich reward.'”
Rarity:	R
